scripts.create_server: mkdir server && cd server && npm init -y
scripts.nodeModule: cd server && touch .gitignore && echo node_modules >> .gitignore && echo .env >> .gitignore
scripts.server_directory: cd server && mkdir config controllers middleware models routes
scripts.cleanup1: cd ./client/src && rm setupTests.js reportWebVitals.js App.test.js logo.svg
scripts.client_cleanup: npm run cleanup1 && npm run cleanup2
scripts.client_components: cd ./client/src/Components && touch Home.jsx About.jsx Edit.jsx Navbar.jsx
scripts.client_dependancies: cd ./client && npm install react-router-dom bootstrap tailwindcss && npx tailwindcss init
scripts.server_dependencies: cd ./server && npm install express bcrypt body-parser cors dotenv express-session mongodb mongoose passport passport-local
scripts.server_start: npm run create_server && npm run nodeModule
scripts.server_content: npm run server_apps && npm run server_directory
scripts.client_start: npm run create_client && npm run client_cleanup
scripts.client_content: npm run client_directory && npm run client_components
scripts.build_server: npm run server_start && npm run server_content
scripts.build_client: npm run client_start && npm run client_content
scripts.build: npm run build_server && npm run build_client
scripts.dependencies: npm run server_dependencies && npm run client_dependancies
scripts.create-mern-stack: npm run build && npm run dependencies
